category.name: Product Structure.Configurator Context
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PSM_PCA_enable_default_variant_configuration
preference.preference_description: Enables default configuration to consider Product Configurator authored constraints while opening the Product structure Valid values are: * false: Product Structure will not be configured using Product Configurator authored constraints, while opening. This is the default value. * true: Product Structure will be configured using Product Configurator authored constraints, while opening.
